message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper presents a method for robots to capture emotional intensities from body poses during human-robot interaction. This involves computer vision techniques (cs.CV) to extract pose descriptors, machine learning algorithms (cs.LG) to estimate emotional intensities, and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) to equip robots with emotional intelligence. The paper also includes field tests on a physical robot (cs.RO) and focuses on human-robot interaction (cs.HC).
